website_summaries.verdict: Clear plumper designed to be used under your lip color. The “next best thing” to injections.
pros: The most noticeable plumping to channel your inner Angelina Jolie
Takes just one minute to penetrate lips
Comes in a variety of colors including clear, which can be used on its own as a plain gloss
cons: As the name suggests, it creates a more extreme sensation on the lips that some found too intense
Caused some irritation if it got onto the skin

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This works. It does burn and tingle for the first 10 minutes but I think it's because your lips are plumping that fast! It has a strawberry smell and the texture feels like regular lip gloss
customer_reviews.author: kristy miller

customer_reviews.title: Awful product and they sent me a smaller product than what I bought and paid for!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! I ordered and paid for the .14oz and received the .05 oz. I am also very disappointed with the product. There is almost no tingling when applied and I can’t tell any difference in my lips. I have used other lip plumpers and had good results. This one is not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel graham

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t noticed any plumping effect after a week of use.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a thick jelly in the tube- hope I didn’t get a stale product. Has a very sweet, very fruity scent (almost like a kid’s product) and leaves lips very glossy, shiny, and wet-looking. Have been using regularly for over a week and haven’t noticed any short- or long- term plumping effect (although the very shiny effect makes lips look a little bigger). Once in a while I can feel a very slight tingling when I first put it on, but that disappears right away. Right now I feel like it’s way too expensive for just a shiny gloss. I’ll update if I notice any plumping.
customer_reviews.author: Colored Ink

customer_reviews.title: Love the natural color it gives my lips as well
customer_reviews.text: Stinging/tingling for about 5 minutes then reaches full effect. Be careful to apply only within your lips, I got a little bit above my lip and it became all red and irritated. My lips stay plump for about an hour with one application. Love the natural color it gives my lips as well. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehh!
customer_reviews.text: I love lip plumpers, but I have paid $2 at the beauty supply store for basically the same thing. I'm extremely disappointed as I was expecting an amazing plumper for the $ I paid. This product is not bad it's just WAY TOO EXPENSIVE!
customer_reviews.author: Skyjolee69

customer_reviews.title: face breaks out in a rash???
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it I noticed a little bit of a difference, and the pain wasn't bad. I was generally satisfied. However, the second time I used it i noticed my lips and lower face start to break out in a rash. Now every time I use it the rash gets more intense and all over the bottom of my face, chin, and neck. I don't have particularly sensitive skin so this was really strange for me... Definitely can't recommend this to other people. I hoped it would work but can't be having a reaction every time I use it. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Causes a red rash that doesn't go a way
customer_reviews.text: Hello, after using this product, I noticed there was a decent size red "patch" above my lip. I stopped using the product and it faded a little, but now, six months later, I still have to put cover up above my lip as it is still pink. . I am not happy about that! Unfortunately, I purchased this as a gift for my sister before the red spot showed up, and she said she was red above her lip the first time she used it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Macchi

customer_reviews.title: Hell Yesssss!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so you put it on your lips and then you don't feel anything for the first minute then you start to feel like your lips are stinging for the next couple of minutes and BOOM your top lip is bigger than your bottom! However it does not last long. The shine lasted for a couple hours but the plumpness goes down after like 30 minutes. The stinging does kinda feel nice and the lip gloss smells like strawberries! I will def buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Very effective temporarily
customer_reviews.text: There is definitely a difference when wearing this product, though I saw no long term change. Not quite as sticky as other glosses. I had a very slight burn when going straight out into the sun but I also have sun sensitivity in general, this judt may have exacerbated it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rajchart

customer_reviews.title: Not so much!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize when I tried it, your lips feel like they’re being stung by bees. I don’t see much plump, just a weird feel and taste.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Zemla

customer_reviews.title: It takes more applications but does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smooth and easy with sponge tip on the applicator . Starts off strong, tingling your lips, then subsides within a minute or two. It's not a long lasting plump for your lips, but if you don't mind reapplying it does the job! It's not really sticky like some of the other brands, which is nice too!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: minimal results
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt tell a difference in my lip size using this. It really just made them feel like they were chapped with lip gloss on. The burning sensation was to be expected and was not too much to handle but i was somewhat disappointed for how much i spent on this i thought i would have gotten better results.
customer_reviews.author: Alivia Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Expensive 5 min gimmick. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive, strawberry-smelling lip gloss. No better than you get in a $5 fruity lipgloss in the kids make up aisle at CVS. A bit of a tingle like when you put on any menthol type lip balm, which makes your lips a little pink for 5 min. Then it dries out. Not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very temporary
customer_reviews.text: Actually kind of enjoy the tingling sensation, and lips do seem to slightly plump shortly after use. But it's definitely short lived. Wouldn't be too big of a deal if the price wasn't so high for an item that doesn't last long. With regular use, could see this being used up in a week. It's okay, I'd just make sure to temper expectations a lot.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The only lip gloss plumper that actually works. Slight tingling, doesn’t burn like other plumping glosses. Might dry out your lips a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this lip plumper. There are so many options in the market that really do not work, but Lip Venom really does what it claims to do. It clearly puffs up and increases the size of your lips. It does tingle a lot, but I don't mind... I know it's working!!! :) Would definitely buy again!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom's World

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job Well!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a plump look this is the product for you. It's on the pricey side but it does exactly as promised. Before and after pictures included.
customer_reviews.author: Seneca

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I expected some sensation when applying to my lips, but nothing. The lip gloss caused irritation around my lips, and that's the only sensation I felt. This doesn't work. I'm guessing that other people think it works because it causes inflammation to the skin around your lips, making them look red around the edges and briefly appear larger.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Z

customer_reviews.title: I'm a man and highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: A friend introduced this product to me years ago and I've loved it ever since. If you identify as male and prefer natural, discreet look, using a tiny symbolic bit is enough to spread over your lips, make them look healthy and hella full, juicy and sexy. If you like to go all out on make up, use more and the extra shimmer will pair well with whatever make-up look you went with. Best lip plump ever.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Tingle for sure!
customer_reviews.text: It is the only product that I have come across that works as far as plumping (lip gloss), you definitely feel the tingle and my lips do actually get a bit of color. I don't have full lips to begin with so any little bit helps.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel S

customer_reviews.title: Plumps Lips Well
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really liked the product, it made my lips glossy and full. I do think that it is a little overpriced considering the amount of it that you get/ how quickly it runs out. I think that I will try a cheaper option next time, however if you have money to spend I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Careful for allergies
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but it doesn’t do amazing things. It’s a really nice glass and gives you a little bit of plumpness But it doesn’t last very long and I got a little bit on my neck because it was on my hand from originally opening it and I got a hive
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't plump
customer_reviews.text: It's a great gloss but it doesn't plump. It tingles and burns a little when applied and does plump a little bit but only for about 15-20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne L. Randol

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: So this is one of the very few that actually work, this has a light pink tint and no burn. Is a pinch drying but nothing I can't deal with. Lasts about 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: EC Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Best plumper I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I read about this one in an article online, unfortunately I cannot remember or I would cite it. You can actually feel it working. Yes, it does sting a bit but short of lip injections this is the best temporary lip plumping gloss I have found and it has a yummy bubble gum smell that reminds me of the roller gloss from when I was a kid :)
customer_reviews.author: LuvIt

customer_reviews.title: Will save you hundreds
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has gotten lip injections in the past, I wish I had known about this product before all of the money I spent!!! The results are beautiful and give you a lift and plump that many would pay hundreds if not thousands for! It lasts for about an hour for me but is a great addition to my makeup routine now
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Soft Lips that say, "Kiss Me".
customer_reviews.text: It really works. I can tell when I don't use it. It does plump the lips up a bit. I don't want duck lips, I just need a little help without surgery. Love this and will buy more when gone. Can be worn over my fav lipstick. (or under)
customer_reviews.author: looKin4LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT!!! Nothing,only sticky shine:-(
customer_reviews.text: A HUGE Disappointment, Absolutely NO Burn, even after Exfoliating my Lips with a Brand New Toothbrush:-( Nothing!!! Zero!!! Zilch!!! Complete waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA

customer_reviews.title: plump lips
customer_reviews.text: this product works well. obviously for real plumped lips, you need real lip injections. but this lip gloss does the job of making your lips bigger for a little bit until you have to reapply. it’s expensive for how much it gives you, but it’s worth it if you really love the look it gives you. good packaging.. it doesn’t hurt, either. just tingles. i’ve bought this product like 4 times now, love this gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Zwelling

customer_reviews.title: Plumps lips
customer_reviews.text: This product really works at plumping lips. Burn takes getting used to. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Musumeci

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that works well.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has really enjoyed this product. She says it works better than expected. She has used several brands and this one is her go to.
customer_reviews.author: T. Richman

customer_reviews.title: Did not plump lips at all
customer_reviews.text: I read all the positive reviews about how great this product works. Did absolutely nothing to my lips, except made them shiny and red! Did not plump them at all. Funny how it would work on some lips and not others. Don't we all have the same lips as human beings? LOL :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This stuff does exactly what I was looking for. ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does exactly what I was looking for. I know some pple have said it only lasts 2 hrs. I dont find this to be true. I apply it once in the morning. The plumpness lasts all day. Tge shine does not bit I use lip ointment throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: christen weiss

customer_reviews.title: Isn’t “extreme”
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t plup EXTREMELY noticeable, but it definitely does make your lips bigger! I’ve had 1 or 2 people say they’ve looked different without knowing I’ve put anything on them. I’d recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Auroraa M

customer_reviews.title: Its old
customer_reviews.text: It's old and yellow, should be a clear color, just bought another
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Boatman

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: You can feel something when you uses this but I really don't see much of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Frant

customer_reviews.title: Great lip plumper
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip plumper. It tingles and makes my lips look noticeable bigger. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It tingles when it is applied, but it definitely works and it smells good too! Great product! Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Catelyn

customer_reviews.title: Its so so
customer_reviews.text: I definitely felt the tingling!! Be cautious and apply CAREFULLY! I applied it like a basic lip gloss and ended burning the skin around my lips. It thick and spreads very well. I noticed a slight difference after about 5 minutes. However, it doesn't have a long enough lasting effect.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip product. My lips feel great, and it seems to smoothe out any fine lines. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: It did not work well for me - no noticeable plumping. The taste and smell are pleasant. I was looking for a product to help with fine lines, but this wasn't it. Try Buxom instead - definite plumping, beautiful colors and really nice sensation.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it it works amazingly will definitely be buying more from now on
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: It burns so good
customer_reviews.text: Not 100% sure it actually did anything but sure felt like it was, plus had the added benefit of dissuading my kids from stealing my drinks when their lips started to prickle and sting🤣
customer_reviews.author: Kitten

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It does work! Feels like you ate very spicy food and your lips burn. It doesn't last very long... 10 minutes for me. Wish it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie Burnside

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lips
customer_reviews.text: Great clear lip gloss with a little tingle. The tingle doesn't last long, but the shine stays for awhile. Love this lip gloss. I prefer clear and this goes on smooth and makes my lips feel beautiful 😊.
customer_reviews.author: SUPAstar

customer_reviews.title: Feel the burn...but look gorgeous and natural!
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well. I am a beauty/makeup junkie and am very picky. This product I like because it gives your lips a natural no fuss clear flush of rosy natural bigness that looks sexy and like your not trying too hard. I like products that actually work and this one does. Yes it does burn a bit but only for a few minutes. Its worth it though!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money, but not magic.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased two tubes so far and I’m very happy with the results. Not much of a tingle, but I notice a slight difference. Keep in mind. It’s not magic
customer_reviews.author: Terril Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny with order cases of it if I could. Same price at Ulta but they can’t keep it in stock it’s so good.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It really works well and last a good while!
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job plumping lips and does not sting badly like some of the reviews said. Do not like the smell/ taste. Would be nice if the packaging/ tube was more attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Parr

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Best lip plumper I have tried from a department store :) You instantly (within 10 seconds) will see a result. Can apply over a lipstick, or under - either way, it will plump your lips! Definitely a great product.
customer_reviews.author: K3ira

customer_reviews.title: Caused allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: This product caused me to have a severe allergic reaction! Be cautious using this product!
customer_reviews.author: keysha A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I love this so much. It really plumps your lips a bit and gives the a nice clean glossy finished look.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie B

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the short plumping effect
customer_reviews.text: This product plumps the lips but effect does not last long...It costs too much for what you get. I think you can find similar plumping effect products in other places for much lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Saw no results will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Does not make much of a difference.
customer_reviews.text: This product is really overhyped. It only works for about an hour and then lips go back to normal. Works best if you use seldomly.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Persaud

customer_reviews.title: Lip plumper
customer_reviews.text: The product was unacceptable for the price I paid. Will never buy it again
customer_reviews.author: diane campbell

customer_reviews.title: Overhyped!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because i saw the hype on it everywhere but i never got the tingling feeling and i never noticed a difference :/
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Lip plumper
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t do anything to my lips. It just a gloss. No plumper
customer_reviews.author: Lenora

customer_reviews.title: burns a tiny bit, but definitely plumps my lips ...
customer_reviews.text: burns a tiny bit, but definitely plumps my lips...I suggest using it at night as it does leave a little redness around my lips. I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiki Tina

customer_reviews.title: Too Faced To Two Lips 👄
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says. I have very thin lips. Ordered it on Monday; received it an hour ago and in ten minutes I had a distinctive upper lip! The stinging was almost unnoticed. I was expecting a real pain from some of the reviews. Guess it varies per individual. Will buy again and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: COLETTE

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. Not even a little but very moisturizing on lips
customer_reviews.author: Theodore T. Minnick

customer_reviews.title: Lip injection extreme
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Did nothing but burn my lips.expensive mistake. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: arlene  loftis

customer_reviews.title: Not sure...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived slightly damaged and already opened. The tube of gloss itself feels cheaper than Too Faced’s products in store. I’m reluctant to use it since it appears used prior.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Did not last long and did not plump. Don’t waste your money. I’ve found the Ilya brand to be better
customer_reviews.author: shalese

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is a lot of tingle but little plump. I didn't see that much difference in my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: meh not worth it
customer_reviews.text: smells pretty bad and doesn't plump the lips noticeably at all. way too expensive. feels weird. looks like a nice lip gloss though but eh.
customer_reviews.author: lanse

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There's no tingling sensation and absolutely nothing happens to the lips. It's like a regular lip gloss.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Plump my lips!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this thing, it burns a little (2 mins or less) but it works!!
customer_reviews.author: LesheaIam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and it works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome, I just wish the effect lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product sooo much !! If you can’t handle a little pain on your lips for about 10 minutes I wouldn’t get it
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Mariee

customer_reviews.title: Just a gloss
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great gloss but does nothing for plumping lips. It only irritates the skin .
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip plumper! it doesn't cause irritation but it does burn for a few mins.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Give it a whirl. You'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I wasn't quite sure what to expect. After reading countless reviews and watching review videos on YouTube it seemed quite controversial. The sensation was intense but the results are beautiful and voluptuous! I now wear this daily! Dont let the bad reviews scare you. Give it a whirl! You'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dachel

customer_reviews.title: Expensive lipgloss!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product did not do anything for me. It turned out to be a very expensive lipgloss.
customer_reviews.author: Denise W

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t plump your lips
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t plump at all. It’s a decent moisturizer but there is no plumping involved.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Lips Not big enough: (
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Too Faced Cosmetics Lip Injection Extreme fthrough Amazona few weeks Ago. I have used it and have noticed a slight plumpness on my lips, I have tried different products so far this is the one I have liked the most.
customer_reviews.author: Alma I.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see any difference in my lips after applying several times.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lott

customer_reviews.title: Nauseating odor
customer_reviews.text: The smell is so disgustingly sweet I cannot use the product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra A. Jaffe

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lip plumper. I use it morning and night and my lips are fuller. I don't experience any burning or redness. It's a nice gloss to wear on its own or under lipstick. Even my daughter kept stealing it from me to use.
customer_reviews.author: Berly

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: Must just be me but I didnt notice any change
customer_reviews.author: Areona

customer_reviews.title: No bang, but some results for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Product performed as advertised. There is a slight tingling, which should be no problem to anyone, followed by a noticeable fullness. Nothing too dramatic and no trout pout, just a reasonable increase in volume.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Admire

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.text: If there is any plumping of your lips, it is so imperceptible as to be useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jo McGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love looveeeeeeeee. Don’t wear it too often tho it dries but it’s so great
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $50 bucks!!! All this product ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth $50 bucks!!! All this product does is bring blood to the surface of your lips which causes redness and a puffy appearance. AND it only lasts about 3 to 5 minutes. You can get the same effect by rubbing cinnamon on your lips. SPEND YOUR MONEY ON SOMETHING THAT WORKS!! THIS IS A GIMMICK!
customer_reviews.author: Ion

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed. Super plumping
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I've been using it for years and recommend it to everyone, 10/10!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but it seemed to be empty a lot quicker than anticipated!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey3

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for a few hours. There’s no long term differences that I’ve noticed like it claimed. But I only started using it a few months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this product received so much negative feedback. Most lip enhancers do not work at all, this one DOES work. It chaps your lips a bit but only because it enhances them causing dryness once they stretch. Only last for about 2 hours though. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Keys

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product really stings and doesn’t plump my lips at all
customer_reviews.author: kimberly ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I say the stronger the sting the better :) that's just me tho, Works great & I'm 24 with full lips so prob different for me, I love It tho,
customer_reviews.author: PinkboutIt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product! It was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian and Tammie

customer_reviews.title: didn't do anything....
customer_reviews.text: for the price, it did nothing but make my lips peel, I tried putting cream on first then product didn't plump, very drying.... didn't do anything, went in the trash, would have sent back but i used it for 2 weeks just to see, haven't used it for several days, my lips are still dry, whitish, constantly have to keep cream on lips, forget wearing lipsticks it just made my lips look worst...I did have hope for it,.. but was disappointed..I'll stick to what I've been using....
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get what it said i was getting u ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get what it said i was getting u just got a box.... I need my money back please
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not painful but a little more irritation then the usual lip-plumper
customer_reviews.text: This definitely works well, but be careful not to get anywhere but on your lips because it will result in irritated, bright red skin that lasts for quite a while. Not painful but a little more irritation then the usual lip-plumper. This one feels sort of like a stinging sensations, while other plumpers I have used feel much more tingley. I was happy with my purchase, HOWEVER it was a tad expensive... you can definitely find an equal or better product for much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: P Myers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product. did what it was suppose to do! thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This gloss is amazing! It will cause irritation if you accidentally go outside of the lip line, but otherwise on the lips it just gives a strong tingling sensation. It seems like the gloss increases blood flow to your lips, which does make them look larger!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: ... lips but did not last long however it felt great on lips and smells great
customer_reviews.text: Did plump lips but did not last long however it felt great on lips and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: kathy buel-self

customer_reviews.title: Expected Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give it a try, despite my doubts. Does not quite live up to the name. I'd say the tingling irritation is the only constant effect from this product. Very cool as a tingly sensation lipgloss but did not make my lips any bigger or even slightly full. My mom tried it as well, to get a second opinion and it just made her lips irritated and red.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I buy the big one 0.14 OZ and receive the small size 0.05 Oz
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't know its the original but I love it
customer_reviews.author: Laboratorios Mallo

product_meta.title: Too Faced Cosmetics Lip Injection Extreme, 0.14 oz
product_meta.description: Lip Injection Extréme is a lip plumping serum that gives long term results based on four of the most scientifically proven and advanced lip plumping technologies. Increase lip volume and maintain plumpness with continued use!
feature_bullets: The Collagen Booster, Maxi lip our formula is proven to stimulate and increase collagen to plump lips up to 40% fuller and decrease lines by 30%, while increasing lip moisture up to 60%, long term!
The Botanical Cocktail of Avocado Oil and Jojoba hydrates, moisturizes and soothes lips for fuller, sexier and more kissable lips.
Instant Blood Vessel Dilators technology found in the original “Lip Injection” dilates blood vessels filling lips with a lasting rush of blood and oxygen for up to a 20% plumper pout!
